title: wtf
body:
how do I get banned for calling someone a noob
specially whne their saying their fukcing my mom and my sister how the fuck do I get banned for saying their bad and calling some one noobs wtf!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I didn't curse at the kid that was talking mad crap to me and he was feeding so I called him and noob so how do I get banned wtf!!!!!!!
ur admins are bullshit I was not in the wrong and I stil ge tbanned for calling someone a fucking noob wtf is wrong with u guys 
lol sucks sooo bad H0N is soo much better and they have better admins

replies.body:
> how do I get banned for calling someone a noob

You didn't get banned for calling someone a noob.

You got banned for having a long history of harassment (3 previous punishments), without changing your behavior (continuing to severely harass others). The game you are speaking of, you are the one who started all of the drama for seemingly no reason.

If you feel this punishment is in error, you are welcome to post your chat logs from your in-client reform card and let the community weigh in on whether or not the punishment is deserved. It is the community who determines what is acceptable and what is not acceptable.
https://i.gyazo.com/70f6fe4ab8d0d5f370517d3a105c7780.png

tell me where I deserve to be fucking banned!!!!! why cuz I'm calling kids noobs and telling them how fucking bad they are wtf is wrong with u lame  scrubs mis use of power kids..probably live at home with ur parents, probably still vergins

- constant whining
- telling people to report another
- calling names such as noob
- highly negative throughout the whole game & not being cooperative at all


Remind me again **what's the benefit of talking crap at them like this**? This does nothing but feeds out your frustration, of which does nothing good for the game at all. What's worse is that you don't have to remind them over & over again for the whole game.

All I can say is that the permaban was totally deserved. And like Riot Tantram said, this isn't the only game you got punished for at all, since you still have:

- 2 other game logs hiding in your client/email, and 

- the followed-up punishment logs when you got chat restriction & 14 days suspended. 

Be glad that you got permaban before getting to Level 30. 

-----

Bonus fact:

and ow come it dosnt show the kid fucking talking mad shit to me!!!! cursing at me saying dumb shit to me being a lame stuid kid but only shows my statements why don't u guys go look at the fucking game I played and look at my 30-11 score and all my other team 2-20

> [{quoted}](name=lameadmins,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnAcjo44,comment-id=000300020000,timestamp=2016-07-19T02:20:31.851+0000)
>

> how the fuck am I in the fucking wrong I'm tirred of u lame vergin kids banning me cuz I'm calling kids noobs and telling them their bad wtf is ur guys's problem

It doesn't matter if he talked shit to you. If he did he'll get banned too.

Because it doesn't make any difference what they said. The fact is your behavior is unacceptable regardless of context.
"An eye for eye leaves the whole world blind." Revenge and retaliation are entirely unproductive; you need to be the bigger person and stop the cycle.

Or perhaps this might appeal to your narcissistic side:
If you'd like to feel superior to toxic players, the best thing you can do is completely ignore them, then report them afterward. You can be smugly satisfied with yourself, knowing that you helped to punish a wayward player, while avoiding any repercussions because you did absolutely nothing in retaliation.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect

It's not just your chat logs it's how you come off on these boards.

Tell you what how about next time you are at school and some class mate answers a question wrong you stand up and go on a tirade like you did in the chat logs and see if the teacher keeps you in class.

Honestly your logs are horrible and the fact that you can't see it after repeated warnings is also troubling
Regardless of what the others said, you sound like a child.

Every part of this makes me never want to end up in a game with you.

Let's say that you disagree with how your team is playing. Calling them names and telling them they're bad at the game is not helpful, and if anything will only make them play worse. The issue here is you defaulted to insults pretty much right away, instead of trying to offer any kind of constructive criticism or advice.

For the record, dying a lot ("feeding") is not a reportable offense. Everyone has bad games now and then. Unless they are purposefully dying to help the enemy win, they aren't doing anything wrong.

Also, I like how you keep referring to them as "kids" even though it's painfully obvious you're quite young as well.
Sweet jesus
Yup. You deserved it.

They do, and it was their decision that community behavior will be largely moderated according to the communities ideals of what is acceptable and what is not. :)
Careful there Tantram, you open that door and you leave yourself vulnerable to the jerks of LoL having a majority vote that flaming is "acceptable."

Lol buddy, you really don't get it do you? Are you so mad that you're blind to your own behaviour? Theres a certain limit to everything. Yes calling someone a noob CAN and WILL get you banned it' called negative attitude. And negative attitude is not welcome in the league community. I'll admit I'm not angel. My main account RedTrinketGoneHa was banned back in January this year for calling someone the n word, and I had just previously been punished for the same thing before I got my perma. Did I spend a lot of money on the game? Hell yeah. Was I mad? Damn right! Was I deserving of the ban? Absolutely! Did I come to cry on the forums? Absolutely not, because I KNEW that I was in the wrong. I wasn't blinded by my rage.

Even this account I am not perfect with just yesterday a Morgana was flaming atbme BIG time in my Draven game which we won!? Basically she was saying she was gonna slit my parents throat and all nonsense like that, you know what I did, ignored it. Plain and simple. I might have said something at first but I tried my absolute best to block it out. Cause flaming someone else for flaming you is not worth your own ban. And I'll admit I flame a bit on this account sometimes but it isn't way as bad as my old account. I welcome Riot Tantrum to post logs from my old account and logs from this one, I mean maybe I'm wrong. Maybe I do flame and act negative a lot on this account. But not one time in MONTHS have I gotten a message saying I was reported or a popup.  Feel free Riot Tantrum, I'm not scared. Even if logs show other than what I've been saying.

Refrence accounts 

RedTrinketGoneHa
MaximumKalista
Well said

This is just hilarious to watch. A guy burning in Agony that he's not even strong enough to take a blame. If someone is blaming you, and I mean really, really blaming you and u think its not true, there's gotta be a reason for it. Now idk how Riot will deal with u, probably u begging a thousand times and showing your good behaviour or leave you in this state. All I'd say, look back in ur chat history and make a tally of how many times u have called someone that is hurting to others so stuff like: 
Noob
Weak
F**k
Mother fker
Gay
Suck
Ass
According to riot, these all are hate comments and can get u banned, no matter what ur team is saying to you. There's a reason why they put "mute" button. If you can promise not to use any kind of verbal abusement no matter what the others say, i think u have a chance.
p.s. i dont wanted to use the abuse in the list but it was the only way to show them. ^-^
If it's any consolation I actually like playing normal games with hardcore toxics like yourself, it cracks me up if ELO isn't on the line.

You're name is lame admins, you don't even know that league doesn't really have admins, but a vote feature that flags you for other rioters to look at. Secondly, the tone of your voice and behaviour shows us that you probably didn't just get banned for calling some other kid a "noob". Most likely you've went over board and are trying to mess around to get out of a ban.
i feel as if this attitude that got you banned

Tantram you are seriously my favorite Riot person.
so they can bann me for calling a kid that's feeding and takiing hella shit to me!!!!!!!!!!

The other person's behavior has nothing to do with YOUR ban. Stop bringing it up.

Calling someone a "kid" who "lives in their parents' basement" is irrelevant and has zero impact on the game. You stating it in a derogatory manner makes this harassment.

Calling someone a virgin is also irrelevant. Not only that, but being a virgin is not a bad thing, and not being one has nothing to do with the "adulthood" of an individual. You stating this in a derogatory manner makes this statement harassment.

YOUR behavior got you the ban. Your words, your reactions, your attitude. Its YOUR fault. Grow up (and by that I mean, be more mature about stuff). This is NOT harassment, but a request. Im confident you have the ability to do so. You just need to choose to do it.

> [{quoted}](name=Shahamut,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnAcjo44,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-07-19T16:08:13.296+0000)
>
> The other person's behavior has nothing to do with YOUR ban. Stop bringing it up.
> 
> Calling someone a "kid" who "lives in their parents' basement" is irrelevant and has zero impact on the game. You stating it in a derogatory manner makes this harassment.
> 
> Calling someone a virgin is also irrelevant. Not only that, but being a virgin is not a bad thing, and not being one has nothing to do with the "adulthood" of an individual. You stating this in a derogatory manner makes this statement harassment.
> 
> YOUR behavior got you the ban. Your words, your reactions, your attitude. Its YOUR fault. Grow up (and by that I mean, be more mature about stuff). This is NOT harassment, but a request. Im confident you have the ability to do so. You just need to choose to do it.
